system.description: You turn acorns into splash weapons (up to four) or holly berries into bombs (up to eight). Acorn grenades: thrown up to 100 ft., touch attack; total 1d6 fire per caster level (max 20d6) split as you wish; 1 pt splash per die, ignites combustibles within 10 ft.; Reflex half for splash. Holly berry bombs: place and speak command within 200 ft.; 1d8 + 1/level fire in 5-ft. radius each; Reflex half.
system.target: Up to four acorns or up to eight holly berries
system.savingThrow: None or Reflex half; see text
